short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shopify spy scrapes products from Shopify powered stores and saves as an CSV file

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shopify Spy Scrapes Products is a versatile tool designed to export product details effortlessly from your Shopify store. 
It supports unlimited product listings, making it an invaluable asset for any dropshipper.

ðŸ’¡ Key Features:
User-Friendly Interface: Simple and easy to operate with no setup required.
Completely Free: No sign-up necessary, and you can export data for free.
Automatic Download: Export files automatically CSV formats.
One-Click Export: Export thousands of products with just one click.

ðŸ’¡ How to Use:
Install the Extension: Add the "Shopify Spy Scrapes Products" extension to your browser.
Navigate to Shopify: Go to the Shopify store and select the collection page for the product listings you want to export.
Export Data: Click the Export/Download button to download all product data, including handles, titles, descriptions, vendors, types, and tags.
Save Data: Save the downloaded data in your desired folder and import it into your Shopify store as needed.

ðŸ”’ Data Privacy
All data is processed in your local computer, it never passes through our web server and no one knows what you have saved.
